body: Hi, Chris, thank you very much for your detailed explanation and the fix of the component! However, I still got the following issue with the updated "Read EP Result" component: 1. even when the normByFloorArea is set as False, the caption for the zone heating loads visualization still shows "floor normalized heating energy" (see image 1 and 2) below [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aNZ9EZ3f4*yASW2U8D405fcYkNvfXiH2LUx6*sv4IbeXQ76ph7yK3TYVggehA1q-WtnLiVcwmDsK0lGsWB*UiNAntiPB0ZD8/01.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aNZ9EZ3f4*z-g28EvqQoDx21JBod68mAo5BalZY0utKzhj7-RORu8wXIC6avvubezr4Ex9*bPxBGeP3KBySN2IfK3elNLLJ2/02.JPG) 2. When I try to visualize "zone windows total heat gain energy" normalized by floor area, the caption shows "average" instead, and the color legend is not changed to floor normalized values. (see images 3 & 4 below) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aNZ9EZ3f4*xmKwgSbIv*VB9lZ1RoUGHd7x*ZZSGbi4LezJj774jPXeZO-u283eMfDM3la6UDbFJOgZLwRqQTx*q8emfXc5tx/03.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aNZ9EZ3f4*yN-v1bB03d3HIv-UZWZmAPKeCSAJdRu9gVU0ojFInq5*juHy0QBMU8Pgfqe3S-8W2QfqeNqMPY95QEbSrfMU1k/04.JPG) Hope you and bee-bug-lovers can kindly advise! Thanks!
